var useCursor=function useCursor(){return{onMouseEnter:function onMouseEnter(e){// style stage container:
var container=e.target.getStage().container();container.style.cursor="move";},onMouseLeave:function onMouseLeave(e){var container=e.target.getStage().container();container.style.cursor="default";}};};export default useCursor;
